alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:44PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luna and southwestern Dona Ana Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 844 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles east of Columbus, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camel Mountain and portions of HWY-9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
